long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BetterFont is a Chrome extension designed to enhance web readability with customizable typefaces, font sizes, colors, and more.

With BetterFont, you can effortlessly change:

🖋️ Font family (typeface)
💪 Font weight
🎨 Color
🔍 Font size
📏 Line height
📖 Letter spacing
✨ Font style (e.g., bold, italic, and underline)
🚀 And more features are on the way!

You can also lock the styling to a specific page, so you don't have to reset it every time you refresh the page!

How to use:

1. Install the extension and pin it to your toolbar.
2. Click on the extension icon.
3. Adjust the font styles and enjoy!

If you need help, feel free to contact us at support@betterfont.net.
